name: Dreamcatchers
description:
Incarnate Meikai and eat people's dreams in a Touhou fanmade bullet hell!
 

The story:

Meikai is a Baku with the capability  of eating dreams.
But tonight, something is unusual.. She seems to be trapped in a particularly dangerous dream.

Gameplay:

-Avoid red bullets

-Touch green bullets and blue bullets

The team:

- Automn' (Graphics/3D)
- Drell (Music)
- Jonath The Kane ™ (Programming)
- Enalye (Programming/Music)
